Object# GameCenterLeaderboardSetLocalizationCreateRequest.Data.Attributes

App Store Connect API 3.0+

```
object GameCenterLeaderboardSetLocalizationCreateRequest.Data.Attributes
```

## [Properties](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterleaderboardsetlocalizationcreaterequest/data-data.dictionary/attributes-data.dictionary#properties)

`locale``string` (Required) The specified locale. To learn more, see [Managing metadata in your app by using locale shortcodes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/managing-metadata-in-your-app-by-using-locale-shortcodes).

`name``string` (Required)
